description.narrative: NGO Hromadske TV formulated Project objectives as follows: Increased institutional capacity of Hromadske as an independent media with public service mission, including: (1) support to implementation of the 2019-2021 Strategy element aiming to bring Hromadske into top-10 online news resources in Ukraine by 2021;(2) testing digital opportunities for growing online audience;(3) improving visual quality of Hromadske content in 2019-2021 including in depth reporting, producing documentaries; (4) strengthened technical capabilities for visual storytelling (including producing documentaries); (5) addressed polarization of the society and the urban/rural break-up; (6) enhancing the organizational structure (eliminating conflict of interests in the governance model; creating a lean, transparent and accountable organizational structure; establishing a competent team focusing on audience outreach and engagement as well as commercial revenues);(7) Participation of Hromadske in at least one management/accelerator type of media support programmes over the Project period, aimed at enhancing sustainability of independent media (increasing commercial revenues, improving distribution etc.) The above scope is too broad, and upon dialogue with the Partner, the main objectives of this intervention were narrowed down to:1) Enhancing the organizational structure of NGO “Public Television” (eliminating conflict of interests in the governance model; creating a lean, transparent and accountable organizational structure; establishing a competent team focusing on audience outreach and engagement as well as commercial revenues);2) Support to implementation of the 2019-2021 Strategy as to developing the web-site, increasing audience outreach and engagement on-line;3) Increasing the production of quality content in 2019-2021 (focus on the production of documentaries); 4) Participation of the NGO “Public Television” in at least one management/accelerator type of media support programmes over the Project period. The training programme should focus on enhacing sustainability of independent media (increasing commercial revenues, improving distribution etc.). This aims to create enabling conditions for Phasing out Swedish support to this Partner after 2022. Throughout the intervention the cooperation is also expected to achieve the KPIs from its 2019-2021 Strategy, with particular focus on audience outreach and enagagement, as well as diversification of funding sources.

tag.narrative: 16.10 - 0 Säkerställa allmän tillgång till information och skydda grundläggande friheter, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning och internationella avtal.
16.10 - Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
